data.title: The house that Tom built, showing why, how, when and where this house was erected.  Including elaborate working details of the methods used in securing the site; the construction of the building; impartial notes on the architect; an opinion of the furnace man; and other interesting and valuable suggestions for those about to select a home. By Charles Gilbert Hine.
